lines.text: My wife...this young lady is going to help you.

[last lines, talking about his horror story to the president of the film company]
Why don't you get Bela Lugosi? It's right up his alley!
Don't hurt her, Grego, she's a pretty one!
I have a good mind to report you to the Chamber of Commerce!
What do you want with me?
Your will to live! Your mind!
Gosh all fish hooks! Stop the car, Elmer! Stop the car!
